# About this site
This is a technical blog built with Jekyll focused on programming and computer science topics.

## Navigation
- [Home]({{ site.url }}{{ site.baseurl }}/)
- [Categories]({{ site.url }}{{ site.baseurl }}/category)
- [Tags]({{ site.url }}{{ site.baseurl }}/tag)
